activities: QSSI provides credit to businesses.  Some businesses are owned by non-corporate or limited entities and thus are considered "consumer" entities for the purpose of credit and privacy laws in the USA and the EU.
personaldata: Consumer credit data obtained electronically from credit bureaus/agencies.  Not Manual.
